actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that business and labor should support President Jimmy Cater in his efforts to curb inflation by voluntarily agreeing to provide him with advance notification of any proposed wage or price increases.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of Congress that business and labor should support President Carter's efforts to control inflation by voluntarily agreeing to provide him with advance notification of any proposed wage or price increases and by joining with him in exploring other cooperative approaches.

titles.title: Concurrent resolution expressing the sense of the Congress that business and labor should support President Jimmy Cater in his efforts to curb inflation by voluntarily agreeing to provide him with advance notification of any proposed wage or price increases.
